title_original: Israel's largest ever military flyover hammers Iranian military targets
content_original: Israel pummeled Iranian targets with simultaneous airstrikes from roughly 200 fighter jets in what the Israeli military dubbed its largest ever military flyover in its history. The Israel Defense Forces (IDF) on Saturday published video of its airstrike on missile launchers in western Iran as Israel and the U.S. take part in a joint effort against Tehran. The IDF said the fighter jets flew under the direction of IDF intelligence and the Israeli Air Force and executed an "extensive attack" against the Iranian regime's missile and defense systems in western and central Iran. "This is the largest military flyover in the history of the Israeli Air Force (IAF), conducted following accurate planning and based on high-quality intelligence, while synchronizing hundreds of fighter jets at the same time," the IDF said. title_en: Israel's largest ever military flyover targets Iranian military sites
summary_en: Israel conducted its largest-ever military flyover, with approximately 200 fighter jets striking missile launchers and defense systems in western and central Iran. The operation, directed by IDF intelligence and the Israeli Air Force, represents a significant escalation in joint Israeli-US efforts against Tehran. This extensive attack on Iranian military infrastructure highlights the deepening conflict between Israel and Iran.
